title: Interpretation of divorce in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing divorce in a dream for a single girl When an unmarried girl sees a vision of divorce in a dream, it may be a sign that she will not get engaged. Divorce when a girl sees without engagement symbolizes the occurrence of problems and quarrels between her and her partners. Seeing divorce in a girl's dream may be due to her hesitation and fear of marriage in general. If an unmarried girl sees divorce in a dream, she separates from someone in her dream. It symbolizes that changes will occur in her life. Seeing divorce in a dream for a girl who is still in school. It says that he will excel and achieve the things he wants. When the girl sees it divided into three. It symbolizes that he will be able to achieve excellence and success in life. It will also remove sorrows and worries from her life. Whoever sees in her dream that her father swears to divorce. It symbolizes that he will marry her soon, God willing. It is considered a sign that he will live a period full of sadness in the event that joy takes place in the wedding ceremony. If a woman marries someone she knows after her husband divorces her. It symbolizes that she will carry sperm from her husband into her womb. Or that her life will undergo changes that will make her move to a better place. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing a woman and her husband in a dream separates her. He mentions that she will spend a lot of money and good things on her in the event of his divorce without reason. When a husband divorces his wife without reason or problem in a married woman's dream. It shows that she lives in a state of uncertainty in her life. She also makes decisions while lost. It symbolizes that she endures a lot for her home, and bad words, and this is according to the Imam The honest. Divorce of a married woman can be a sign that she is losing many opportunities in the field of work that reaches her. When a married woman dreams that she is asking for a divorce from her husband. It symbolizes that her life will witness changes that will be better than the current situation. And a woman sees problems with her husband in a dream and filed for divorce. It is considered a sign of divorce actually in reality God. Crying in a dream because of the divorce that happened to her indicates that she regrets a lot about the decisions she makes. And whoever sees herself in a dream crying because her husband divorced her. It shows that she has strong feelings of love towards him and is very attached to him in reality. title: Interpretation of seeing the Kaaba from a distance for unmarried women by great interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Kaaba from afar for unmarried women. Mecca and the Kaaba is a face that the hearts of all Muslims aspire to, and seeing it, whether in reality or in dreams, is one of the most beautiful and wonderful things a person desires. Interpretation of seeing the Kaaba from afar for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about the Kaaba by Ibn SirinThe interpretation of seeing the Holy Kaaba from afar For an unmarried woman, it indicates that she will fulfill many of the desires that she aspires to achieve and strives to achieve. But if an unmarried girl sees me inside the Kaaba, this indicates that she will marry in the near future a young man who has religion and morals. As for seeing the covering of the Kaaba, it is a sign of highness and honor. What the dreaming girl will achieve. As for seeing the Kaaba inside the dreaming girl’s house, this is evidence of her good qualities and morals. What is the interpretation of seeing the Kaaba from afar for a single woman in Nabulsi? The dream of circumambulating the Kaaba indicates a lot of money and abundant sustenance. If the dreamer sees himself standing in front of The Kaaba is evidence of improvement and progress in work and the acquisition of a prominent position. Interpretation of a dream about crying in the Kaaba indicates the disappearance of problems and the dreamer’s fears. A change in the position of the Holy Kaaba indicates speed in making a decision for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the Kaaba from afar for an unmarried woman by Ibn Shaheen. A dream about the honorable Kaaba in the dreaming girl’s home is evidence of the sincerity that distinguishes her. But if the dreaming girl sees that she is in the Kaaba and that she is drinking Zamzam water, then this dream indicates that she will achieve all her dreams and goals in the future. Life. Seeing the Kaaba in a dream. Seeing the fall of the Kaaba wall indicates the death of the ruler of the country. As for a dream of circumambulating the Kaaba or a dream of touching the Black Stone, it indicates that the dreamer is following in the footsteps of the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. But if he sees that he is walking around the Kaaba, then it shows good character. Which characterizes the dreamer. If the lady sees that she is entering the Kaaba, and if she is sick, she is healed. The dream of visiting the Kaaba indicates salvation from problems and worries and abundance of sustenance. Going to the Kaaba in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees the Kaaba, this is evidence of her adherence to religion, purity, and chastity. Part of the covering of the Kaaba is evidence of its fame and honor. Seeing an unmarried girl praying in a dream is evidence of marriage to a righteous man and heralds the acceptance of her prayers. title: Interpretation of seeing the name Yassin in a dream in detail

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing the name Yassin in a dream, based on the opinions of interpretation scholars, has led to the names in the dream having a distinct meaning, and apart from that, they convey good news to whoever sees them. This name has a very beautiful meaning, and it should be noted that the interpretation of this vision differs among people depending on the condition of the dreamer, and we will see the truth of that in the interpretation of seeing the name Yassin in a dream in this article. Interpretation of seeing the name Yassin in a dream for a man: The dreamer aspires to goodness as a result of seeing this name in his dream, as he believes that it has a good connotation, so he has a strong desire to know the interpretation of seeing this name: The translator Ibn Shaheen believes that if the name Yassin appears in a man’s dream, it may indicate On the abundance of sustenance. As well as obtaining an abundance of sustenance and goodness as quickly as possible. Likewise, the name Yassin in a man’s dream is a symbol of his appointment and appointment to an increasingly better position. Or perhaps you will receive a huge financial reward in the near future. In the event that he encounters the owner of the vision Some problems in reality. The name Yassin in a dream can symbolize liberation and getting out of these problems as soon as possible. In addition, some dream interpreters have confirmed that the name Yassin indicates the honor of the dreamer. He enjoys divine providence in his life in general. While if The man was already married and had no children. There is no doubt that the name Yassin in a dream carries good news for this man and that childbirth is near. Moreover, she will have another news that she will give birth to a boy, God willing, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the name Yassin in a dreamSee also: Interpretation The dream of seeing the name Aisha in detail and its implications. Seeing the name Yassin in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried girl has many dreams, including seeing certain names like Yassin in her dream. If an unmarried woman sees the name Yassin in her dream, she either saw it in writing or heard it. This vision may indicate marriage. From a good man who is close to his dear Creator. Most dream interpreters believe that this name indicates the fulfillment of desires. The wishes, dreams and aspirations that this girl has recently sought to achieve. Whereas if this girl is already suffering from the presence of some problems in her life. The presence of the name Yassin in Her dream symbolizes the approaching salvation from these problems as soon as possible. Likewise, if the unmarried woman is already a student and registered for studies. Certainly, seeing the name Yassin in her dream symbolizes the fulfillment of the aspirations, desires, successes, and dreams that she was pursuing. For this girl to succeed in the period Past.Interpretation of seeing the name Yassin in a dream. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing the name Asma in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the name Yassin for a married woman. There is no doubt that a married woman seeing the name Yassin specifically in her dream indicates many good and desirable things, and we will learn about the implications of that through the following lines: Sheikh Ibn Sirin believes that a married woman sees the name Yassin in a dream. This indicates her salvation from many problems that she faces in her life in the near future. Likewise, the name Yassin in a woman’s dream

title: Interpretation of pumpkins in a dream for a single woman and in all cases the correct and comprehensive interpretation

preview.html: Through this article, we will show you the interpretation of seeing pumpkins in a dream for a single woman. There are those who believe that it reflects the extent of his desire to taste the food that he saw in the dream, and there are those who believe that this vision is one of the promising visions of goodness and food, because food in general is a symbol that is truly praiseworthy, because it is The most important blessings of God to man. In general, dreams either symbolize something praiseworthy that brings goodness and sustenance to man, or express the crises he faces in reality, or are a sign of the psychological state he is experiencing, whether stable or disturbed. What do dream interpreters say about the meaning of pumpkin in a dream for one girl? We will learn this through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of pumpkins in a dream for a single woman: Seeing pumpkins in a dream for a single girl is one of the most promising visions for her of goodness and happiness, because it represents obtaining a new job opportunity in a dream. Also, seeing this dream heralds the date of her marriage, which is approaching soon, by God. I know, and it also indicates achieving success and excellence. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is planting pumpkins in a dream, then this vision indicates that something bad will happen to her, as it indicates that she has gone through many crises in reality, and it is also a sign of disobedience to God. Among the hated symbols of pumpkin farmers in a dream is that it expresses the presence of people in her life who are not good for her. As for eating uncooked zucchini in a dream, this vision expresses her sadness and sadness, but if she is actually engaged, this dream indicates that she has gone through a lot of trouble with her. Her fiancé who threatens to divorce her, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about green zucchini for a single woman: Never seeing a single woman with green zucchini in a dream means marrying her to a man with good morals, and God knows best. Through seeing fresh green zucchini in a single girl’s dream, in reality, her condition has changed for the better. If the cooked zucchini in the dream tastes good. This vision indicates the death of worry and an imminent deception, but if its taste is unacceptable, then this dream is unpleasant and indicates distress and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about buying green zucchini for unmarried women: When an unmarried woman sees herself buying squash in a dream, this indicates the arrival of a happy event for her, represented by In the young man’s proposal to marry her soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cooking squash: In the case of cooking zucchini in a dream, this vision is one of the praiseworthy visions for an unmarried girl, which indicates abundant livelihood and abundance, as it is an indication of earning a lot of money. But in the case of eating Cooked pumpkin, then this vision is a sign of a problem for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing yourself cutting pumpkin in a dream: In the case of cutting pumpkin in a dream, this vision expresses the dreamer’s suffering from problems and crises that cause her anxiety and sadness. We provide you with the most important things mentioned in the interpretation Seeing pumpkins in a dream for a single woman. At the end of this article, we must note that all of these interpretations represent interpretations of dreams, as it is not possible to be certain of the fulfillment of these indications in reality because only God knows...

But in the case of eating Cooked pumpkin, then this vision is a sign of a problem for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing yourself cutting pumpkin in a dream: In the case of cutting pumpkin in a dream, this vision expresses the dreamer’s suffering from problems and crises that cause her anxiety and sadness. We provide you with the most important things mentioned in the interpretation Seeing pumpkins in a dream for a single woman. At the end of this article, we must note that all of these interpretations represent interpretations of dreams, as it is not possible to be certain of the fulfillment of these indications in reality because only God knows...

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The most accurate interpretations of a dream about wearing a gold ringInterpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring in a dream What is the significance of this scene? Did the jurists agree on one interpretation of this dream, or does each of them have his own interpretation? What is the difference in interpretation between a white and yellow gold ring? And many other details and visions you will find in the article below. You have a dream that confuses you and you are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring. Wearing a gold ring in a dream means good news for women and men, and it means betrayal, poverty, and problems. The most obvious signs will be explained in detail below: What is the interpretation of wearing a golden ring in a dream for a woman? Strength: If the worker wears a golden ring and flaunts it because of the beauty of her appearance and the brilliance it had, then she will move to a higher stage in her career, and thus God will write down her happiness for her and increase The strength of the profession of the next few daysMedicines: If sadness and sorrow cause the dreamer to live in great distress and she sees in her dream a beautiful ring adorning the shape of her hand, then the vision is benign and symbolizes healing, provided that the ring is not black or bright yellow. Responsibilities: When a woman sees in all her positions Social, whether she is married or divorced. If the ring she wears in a dream is large and heavy, the dream warns her of the problems she faces in her life, whether problems at home, work, at work, or raising children. If she is married and bears responsibility for her children and her husband. A lot of money: When the dreamer sees Many types of gold, and he sees a large number of rings suitable for her, and he is happy with the dream, as this indicates an abundance of money in her next life. Successful romantic relationships: If the ring that a woman was wearing on her hand was beautiful and delicate, then she will have a life partner who will give her happiness and success in her life. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a golden ring by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that the appearance of golden rings in a dream symbolizes two basic signs: The first evidence: If the dreamer sees that the ring does not contain many inscriptions or lobes, then the vision indicates happy news and the death of sorrows. The second evidence: If a large lobe appears in the middle of the ring, then this indicates health and psychological problems that hinder the dreamer’s life. But if the ring that the dreamer is wearing is made of iron and gold, then this is a lot of sustenance and generosity that he enjoys, but after many difficulties in his life. If If the gold ring that the dreamer was wearing in his dream was decorated with a large stone and fell from the ring, and this made his external appearance ugly, then the dream warns him either of bankruptcy and a large loss of money, or of the death of someone. Of his children, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of wearing a golden ring for a young girl of the era who focuses more on her academic field. When she dreams of wearing a golden ring, this indicates her educational excellence and she will obtain a great academic position with the passage of time. But if the girl dreams that her father bought her a gold ring, this indicates On the prosperity she is experiencing in her life and her father's treatment of

title: Interpretation of white roses in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the following article, we present to you, dear reader, through the Encyclopedia of Interpretation of White Roses in a Dream, this type of flower that gives birth to the soul when it sees absolute peace and security. Fun.There are many types of white roses, such as gardenia, white lily and jasmine, which are characterized by their fragrant and wonderful scent and spread around the bed. Therefore, seeing it in a dream makes the dreamer wake up optimistic, seeking to know the interpretation of his vision, which we will mention in detail in the following paragraphs, according to what was stated in the glorious book Interpretation of Dreams.Interpretation of white roses in a dream. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says the following interpretations about seeing white flowers in a dream. Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees himself resting his head on a bouquet of white flowers is good news of a happy marriage. Picking white flowers in a dream symbolizes some problems that the dreamer will face, but he will soon overcome them well. Picking a white flower in a dream indicates an attempt to offend. To an innocent, pure woman against her will. The white, fruitful flower on the trees symbolizes the feeding of good, short-lived offspring, and her mother will be born a female, and only Almighty God knows what lies in the wombs. Seeing white roses cut and thrown on the ground indicates the loss of something dear to the dreamer or the loss of a dream that may It is an act that causes him sadness and distress. A single person picks a white flower in a dream, and in his hand is a soft touch and a fragrant smell that rejoices his heart, good news for marriage to a nice girl of pure origin. White roses in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin narrated the interpretation of white roses in A dream when you see an unmarried woman, and this is what we explain in the following paragraph: White flowers in a person’s dream indicate happiness and joy, and it is good news that he will soon marry a rich man of good character who will live with him happily and prosperously. The dreamer’s dream that she is watering white roses symbolizes that there is a dream She is trying to achieve it and is doing her best to achieve it. Buying white roses in a dream is a sign of readiness for marriage. Choosing a white flower with thorns symbolizes an emotional relationship with the man she loves, but he will cause her harm and harm. Interpretation for a married woman who sees a white rose in a dreamThe interpretation of roses is often White in a dream is good and joyful news and rarely indicates sadness or distress. Likewise, when a married woman sees it in a dream, which we will explain in the following lines: If her husband presents her with a large bouquet of fragrant roses, then the roses are evidence of his feelings of love and appreciation for her and the extent of his keenness to make her happy. Buying roses for her home is a sign of her effort to create a successful family in obedience to God. Seeing him in a dream could be good news for a soon-to-be pregnant with good offspring. Interpretation of seeing white roses in a pregnant woman’s dream: A pregnant woman at that time is very worried about her fetus and therefore tries To explain everything she sees in her dream, believing that it is related to the safety of her fetus, and in the following paragraph we will mention the implications of seeing white. Flowers: Buy white flowers

title: Interpretation of seeing a toothbrush in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a toothbrush in a dream or dreaming of a toothbrush for cleaning the teeth from food residue, and seeing it in a dream indicates preserving customs and traditions, improving material and moral conditions, and enjoying good health, and we will explain that in detail in this article. Interpretation of seeing a toothbrush in a dream about a married man, young man, or unmarried girl. Married, married, pregnant or divorced, it provides interpretations by great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, or contemporary translators, so follow us on the Vision website. Interpretation of a dream about a toothbrush by Ibn Sirin: Seeing brushing teeth with a toothbrush indicates good news, discipline and commitment. Seeing a new toothbrush indicates an improvement in the viewer’s physical condition and health. Seeing a missing toothbrush in a dream indicates problems and psychological problems. Seeing teeth moving as a result of brushing indicates the presence of enemies to the dreamer’s friends and close people. Seeing a new, clean toothbrush in a dream indicates enjoying good health and safety. Of illness. What is the interpretation of seeing a toothbrush in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a toothbrush in a dream for a single woman indicates responsibility, commitment, discipline, and preserving customs, traditions, and good morals. Seeing a dirty or broken toothbrush for a girl in a dream indicates problems and difficulties facing the girl. A dream. A girl losing a toothbrush indicates negligence and insufficient obedience to God, her schoolwork, work, the failure of a romantic relationship, or the breaking of an engagement. If a single girl sees that she is buying a new toothbrush, it indicates the fulfillment of a desire in her life. What is the interpretation? Seeing a toothbrush in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees a new and beautiful toothbrush, it indicates good luck, stability of her married life, and happiness with her husband. Seeing a new toothbrush in a dream for a married woman indicates a promotion for her husband or a new pregnancy. If a married woman sees that the toothbrush is lost It indicates the presence of problems in her married life and perhaps a shortcoming in worship. What is the interpretation of seeing a toothbrush in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a new and beautiful toothbrush, it indicates the safety of the pregnancy and the newborn, and the health of the newborn. If a pregnant woman sees a dirty or broken brush, it indicates her suffering. During pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing a beautiful, bright toothbrush indicates the birth of a girl. What is the interpretation of seeing a toothbrush in a dream for a divorced woman: A dream about a clean, beautiful toothbrush indicates good luck and a prestigious job. If a divorced woman sees that she is buying a new toothbrush, it indicates the fulfillment of one’s desires in life and the fulfillment of What is required. Seeing a clean and sterile toothbrush in a divorced dream announces that she is shouldering responsibilities and maintaining her worship and obedience to her Lord. What is the interpretation of a dream about teeth stains: If a person sees stains on the teeth and their shape is bad, it indicates the presence of a problem in his life and his suffering and he can get rid of it in the near future. Seeing disfigurement In teeth, L

title: Escaping from a snake in a single woman’s dream

preview.html: And any harm that happens to the dreamer from the snake is actually harm from his enemy, and we will learn in this article from our website the explanation of the interpretation of chasing a snake and escaping from it in a dream, so stay with us Interpretation of seeing a snake escaping in a dream for a single girl Seeing yourself escaping from a snake in a dream refers to an unmarried woman. To get rid of the corrupt that was causing her problems and crises in her life. Seeing yourself escaping from a snake indicates overcoming difficulties and obstacles in life. This happens if the escape is accompanied by fast running or running in a dream. It is said that he escaped from the snake by dodging in a dream. A sign of academic success and scientific excellence, and God knows best. Or when the single woman sees as if she is hiding from many snakes trying to attack her. She will escape from the plot of her enemies and haters. Escaping from a snake in a dream is evidence that the dreamer distanced herself from bad friends who encourage her to sin and disobey. She saw a large red snake chasing her, so she quickly escaped from it. She will escape from a corrupt emotional relationship that could have harmed her. See also: Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a woman Single Interpretation of seeing a snake escaping in a dream for a married woman Seeing a snake in a married woman's dream is not a good thing, but escaping from it in a dream. It portends the approach of the Gulf and the death of worry, God willing. Seeing a snake in a dream indicates a married woman. There are many problems between her and her husband, due to his many female relationships. Either she escapes from a snake or lives in a dream. It is a sign that the dreamer will stay away from the evil woman who is trying to establish her with her husband. Seeing small snakes in a dream indicates many troubles in life and lack of comfort and stability. And whoever sees a snake attacking her in her dream, there is evil near her in reality. If the snake can bite him, then evil, and God knows best. As for the snake, it was killed in a dream by the dreamer or her husband. Evidence to get rid of the great danger that threatened her married life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from a snake for a man and its meaning Ibn Sirin says that escaping from a snake in a dream without feeling fear is an expression of sadness and anxiety in the dreamer's life. And whoever escapes from a snake in fear and terror in his dream, God saves him from a great danger that almost befalls him. Chase A snake in a dream means that the dreamer will get money from his enemies. And whoever follows the snake to follow him follows the people of chaos and corruption, and God knows best. When a man sees a snake in his house and runs away from it, this is evidence of his wife’s separation and divorce, and he may be expelled from his house, and God knows best. There are interpretive opinions that say that seeing a snake and looking at it without fear in a dream. Evidence that Satan possesses the dreamer and whispers to him often. Killing a snake or viper in a dream means victory and triumph over enemies. And the skin of the snake, and its meat is an expression of livelihood and benefit. title: What is the interpretation of seeing henna in the hair in a dream exactly?

preview.html: Trend website presents to you the complete meaning of seeing henna in a dream. Seeing henna in a dream is one of the most beautiful visions that appear to anyone. It is from the Sunnah of the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. The death of all sorrows that occur in the heart of the dreamer, and through our topic today we explain to you, dear followers, that seeing henna in the dreams of elderly, married, and pregnant women through the books of senior interpretation scholars. And visions. Henna inscription on Al-Asim’s dream. Henna in a dream is considered one of the happy moments for the dreamer, as it expresses the disappearance of sadness and anxiety. Also, seeing henna in a dream is a sign of achieving goals and desires and seeing happiness for the dreamer. Seeing henna applied to an ordinary girl’s hair is evidence of achieving goals. And close marriage, God willing. Henna inscription in a dream is full of dreams that indicate good circumstances and a sign of closeness to God. What is the interpretation of seeing henna in the hair of an ordinary woman? The interpretation of seeing henna in a dream has been completed, and drawing her hand is a sign of the goodness and justice of all her circumstances. When she sees A girl with henna in her dream and not dyeing her hair with it shows her pain and sorrows. If the poor woman wants to work, God will fulfill her dream soon, God willing. If she sees that the fingers of her hands are completely painted with henna in a dream, this indicates that she is a girl close to God. What is the interpretation of seeing henna? Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees in a dream that he is completely removing henna, this indicates many problems of opinion. It also says that seeing henna applied to the hair is a gateway to happiness, peace and psychological comfort. Whoever sees henna on the tips of his fingers, whether women or men, in a dream may Complete, this indicates that the dreamer is very glorious. Seeing henna in general in a dream indicates the loss of poverty, distance from people, and a lot of good worship. What is the interpretation of henna in a married woman’s hair? If a married woman sees that she has dyed her hair with henna, this indicates that she is committing sins. What is the interpretation of seeing henna for a married woman? It indicates the happiness and stability of her married life. Accordingly, if you see her completely painting her hands in a dream, this indicates that she will soon become pregnant and give birth to her children. What is the interpretation of seeing henna on the hand of a pregnant woman? If she sees a large amount of henna in her hair In her dream, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy, God willing. And whoever sees in her dream that she does not want to paint her hand with henna, this indicates the end of her marital relationship with her husband. But if she sees that she dyed her hair with henna, this indicates happiness and joy in her life and ease in her birth. Likewise, if she A pregnant woman dreams of completely removing henna from her body, as this indicates a difficult period of pregnancy, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing henna for a man? Putting henna on his hair indicates that he will receive a debt that must be returned to its owner as soon as possible. But if he sees that he is applying henna On his beard, this indicates the disobedience of that young man and his closeness to sin and disobedience. Likewise, if he sees that he is painting his face with henna, this indicates that he will marry that young man to a virgin girl. And if he sees that he is removing the henna from

What is the interpretation of seeing henna on the hand of a pregnant woman? If she sees a large amount of henna in her hair In her dream, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy, God willing. And whoever sees in her dream that she does not want to paint her hand with henna, this indicates the end of her marital relationship with her husband. But if she sees that she dyed her hair with henna, this indicates happiness and joy in her life and ease in her birth. Likewise, if she A pregnant woman dreams that she completely removes henna from her body, as this indicates a difficult period of pregnancy, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing henna for a man? Putting henna on his hair indicates that he will receive a debt that must be returned to its owner as soon as possible. But if he sees that he is applying henna On his beard, this indicates the disobedience of that young man and his closeness to sin and disobedience.
